title: Leblanc spell cast voice not playing
body: So waaayyy back when I tried Leblanc for my first time on the free champ rotation somewhere near march 2016, LeBlanc's voice for when she cast her spells worked just fine. Fast forward to around July-ish when I got her, I noticed that those sounds weren't playing and it's really tilting me. We're they removed, is it a bug or a problem with my computer? It's been an issue for me for quite a few months and I'd really appreciate some clarifications or know if any1 else is having the same problem.

replies.body:
Hey! 

As others have linked, we are aware of, and fixing the issue. It'll likely roll out with the assassin update, to follow up on my previous statements in those posts. :)
Trust me, Im obsessed with LeBlanc and I know alot of gucci LeBlanc mains, we all know that its a dumb bug that riot need to fix. Ill put a link that one of friends made, a rioter adressed the issue
Im always cought up with LeBlanc news lol
I think this has been a problem before on Leblanc (not sure)
